meanings.definition: Either of two small masses of lymphoid tissue situated one on each side of the throat.
meanings.sent1: My tonsils help protect my throat from germs.
meanings.sent2: The doctor said my tonsils need to be checked for any signs of infection.
meanings.sent3: When my tonsils get swollen, it feels like I have two little bodyguards in my throat.
meanings.sent4: Her tonsils were like tiny soldiers standing guard at the entrance to her throat.
meanings.sent5: The tonsils act as a barrier against harmful invaders in the throat.

meanings.definition: The tonsils are often removed in cases of chronic infection.
meanings.sent1: After the surgery, his tonsils were no longer causing him trouble.
meanings.sent2: The tonsils play a crucial role in fighting off infections in the throat.
meanings.sent3: I joked that my tonsils were planning a rebellion against me.
meanings.sent4: The tonsils, once removed, left a void in the back of her throat.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained how the tonsils can become a source of chronic infection.
